name: Director's Hotel
description:
The director is back, but this time he has a whole new script. 

Escape the hotel

Follow his directions

Or pay the price!

Directors Hotel is the sequel of Directors Mansion where you are trapped in a creepy hotel with a killer and a crazy film maker who wants to make a live action horror film out of your fear!

Credits:
Project Manager & Level Design - Lachlan
(TheF1ip)

(CupheadFG)

(DevN Games)

(SANDBOXGames)

or already embedded with the Horror Engine Asset pack.
